clinical_study.brief_title: Functional Outcomes of Single Digit Replantation Versus Revision Amputation
clinical_study.official_title: Functional Outcomes of Single Digit Replantation Versus Revision Amputation, a Prospective Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Centre hospitalier de l'Université de Montréal (CHUM)

clinical_study.source: Centre hospitalier de l'Université de Montréal (CHUM)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare functional outcomes in single digit replantation subjects compared with revision amputation. Functional outcomes will be assessed by DASH (disabilities of the arm, shoulder and hand) score and with Purdue Pegboard Test by the subject's respective hand therapist at their last visit. Results will contribute to generating a preoperative decision algorithm for single digit amputation injuries.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Immediately following patient discharge from hand therapy
primary_outcome.description: Measured by DASH score (higher scores indicate a greater level of disability, score range from 0 to 100)

primary_outcome.measure: Functional outcome by Purdue Pegboard Test
primary_outcome.time_frame: Immediately following patient discharge from hand therapy
primary_outcome.description: Measured by Purdue Pegboard Test (higher scores indicate a greater level of dexterity and functionality and are typically compared with normative data stratified on the basis of age, score range depends on how the test is administered)

primary_outcome.measure: Functional outcome by Michigan Hand Questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: Immediately following patient discharge from hand therapy
primary_outcome.description: Measured by Michigan Hand Questionnaire (higher scores indicate a greater level of functionality, score range from 0 to 100)

arm_group.description: This group will include subjects who suffered a single digit non-thumb amputation, and whose finger was replanted.
This group will include subjects who suffered a single digit non-thumb amputation, and whose finger was not replanted.

intervention.description: Surgical reattachment of a severed body part
Primary wound closure with removal of exposed bone

study_pop.textblock: All subjects who have suffered a single digit amputation who are treated at the collaborating hospital centres

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Replantation of single digits treated at collaborating hospital centres
- Revision amputation of single digits treated at collaborating hospital centres
Exclusion Criteria:
- Thumb amputation
- Multiple digit amputation
- Failure to follow-up with hand therapist
